law.catch_line: Prohibition of solicitation of motor vehicle repair work near State of Florida motor vehicle inspection stations.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-7. Prohibition of solicitation of motor vehicle repair work near State of Florida motor vehicle inspection stations.
It shall be unlawful for any person to offer to perform or solicit motor vehicle repair work as defined in Section 8A-161.1(ee) of this Code if said solicitation or offer occurs within one thousand (1,000) yards of any State of Florida Motor Vehicle Inspection Station located anywhere in Miami-Dade County, Florida, measured by following a straight line from the nearest point of the State of Florida Motor Vehicle Inspection Station property, on any public road or public right-of-way as defined by F.S. ยง 334.03(22) and (23), as same may be amended from time to time. This provision shall not apply to any business possessing a current occupational license.
If any person violates any of the provisions of this section, such person, upon conviction of such offense, shall be punished by a fine not to exceed five hundred dollars ($500.00), or by imprisonment not to exceed sixty (60) days in the County Jail, or both, in the discretion of the court. Each day of continued violation shall be considered as a separate offense.
